articles.title: Trump says US has signed trade deal with China
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump says the U.S. has signed an agreement with China on trade and expects to soon have a deal with India.

articles.title: 'Only death' at Gaza aid sites as Israel continues to kill the starving
articles.description: Live updates on the situation in Gaza, where aid is desperately needed.

articles.title: Hainault sword killer being sentenced for schoolboy's murder - after court told of family's 'nightmare'
articles.description: A Hainault sword killer is being sentenced for the murder of a schoolboy.
